Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier an unauthorized person on the tracks near Grand. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier an unauthorized person on the tracks near Grand.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
